.class public auto ansi sealed AudienceValidationDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function AudienceValidationDelegate(tokenAudiences As IList(Of String), securityToken As SecurityToken, validationParameters As ValidationParameters, callContext As CallContext) As ValidationResult(Of String, AudienceValidationError)
type AudienceValidationDelegate = delegate of IList<string> * SecurityToken * ValidationParameters * CallContext -> ValidationResult<string, AudienceValidationError>

Docs.param: The to be used for validating the token.
